languages.text: Webber’s AoE attack creates a webbed area for 3 rounds. Characters entering, moving or starting turn in the area must pass an AGI test or become Slowed for 1 round

traits.locale_text: Webber’s AoE attack creates a webbed area for 3 rounds. Characters entering, moving or starting turn in the area must pass an AGI test or become Slowed for 1 round

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text: ウェバーの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続するウェブエリアを生成する。このエリアに入る、通過する、あるいはターンを開始する生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: ウェバーの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続するウェブエリアを生成する。このエリアに入る、通過する、あるいはターンを開始する生き物は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になる。

languages.text: Атаки сетеметом {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} создают на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} клейкую область. Существо, входящее в эту область, пересекающее ее или начинающее в ней {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получить эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Атаки сетеметом {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} создают на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} клейкую область. Существо, входящее в эту область, пересекающее ее или начинающее в ней {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получить эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 1 раунд.

Атаки сетеметом {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g} создают на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} клейкую область. Существо, входящее в эту область, пересекающее ее или начинающее в ней {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получить эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 1 раунд.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} mit einem Netzwerfer erzeugen einen Netzbereich, der 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang anhält. Kreaturen, die diesen Bereich betreten, passieren oder ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} darin beginnen, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} mit einem Netzwerfer erzeugen einen Netzbereich, der 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang anhält. Kreaturen, die diesen Bereich betreten, passieren oder ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} darin beginnen, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} con un lanzarredes crean una zona de red que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Cualquier criatura que entre en esa zona, la atraviese o empiece en ella su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizada{/g} durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} con un lanzarredes crean una zona de red que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Cualquier criatura que entre en esa zona, la atraviese o empiece en ella su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizada{/g} durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: 这把捕网枪的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}会创建一片被蛛网覆盖的区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入该区域、穿过该区域，或是在该区域中开始{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的生物，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 这把捕网枪的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}会创建一片被蛛网覆盖的区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入该区域、穿过该区域，或是在该区域中开始{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的生物，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} au lance-toile créent une zone entoilée qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent, la traversent ou y commencent leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenties{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} au lance-toile créent une zone entoilée qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent, la traversent ou y commencent leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenties{/g} pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Bir ağdolayan ile yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g}, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca yerde kalan ağla kaplı bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren, içinden geçen veya {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} bu alanın içinde başlayan tüm yaratıklar; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlarlar{/g}. Bu etki, 1 raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with a webber create a webbed area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area, moves through it, or starts its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in this area must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Bir ağdolayan ile yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g}, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca yerde kalan ağla kaplı bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren, içinden geçen veya {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} bu alanın içinde başlayan tüm yaratıklar; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlarlar{/g}. Bu etki, 1 raunt sürer.
